dog: variety of coat colors and patterns
tail that may be long or short
different breeds have distinct physical characteristics such as size, shape, and fur texture
elephant: distinctive shape of the head and body
giraffe: ossicones (horn-like structures) on top of the head
tall stature compared to other animals in the photo
guitar: a wooden body with a distinctive shape
a long neck with frets and strings
various hardware such as tuning machines, strap buttons, and input jacks
horse: distinctive head shape with long face and prominent eyes
typically brown, black, white, or grey in color
often seen with a saddle or bridle in photos
may have markings such as a blaze or socks on their legs
house: walls made of brick, wood, or other materials
landscaping or yard around the house
architectural details such as columns, shutters, or balconies
person: facial features such as eyes, nose, and mouth
